/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the city's preferred modes of transportation. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the city's vibrant colors. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
